name: Nutsacker-extension
tagline: A browser extension for Chrome, Safari and Opera Next that adds a jaunty pair of balls to every image on the current page at the click of a button
body:
### Welcome to Nutsacker.
This is a bunch of placeholder text at the moment.

### Download and Install
For Safari, you have to download the .safariextz file and double-click it to install. Chrome and Opera Next can install it from the Chrome Web Store.

### Usage
After install, press the button to Nutsack the images!
(throw in a couple of screen captures).

### Examples
Put some example images here.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
